Text:
Vefified on Mac OS X 10.8.2.
- Copy to applications folder
- Run keygen and follow instructions
- Have fun and do not forget to buy the app if you like it ;)
@ snaky.by yeah, I don't think I'll be paying for it lol pirate forever!!!

Is there supposed to be a confirmation upon successful registration?

I've done this 8 times now, and there's been no confirmation. Never had such difficulty patching Path Finder before.

I successfully apply the patch then open PF.
Next I generate a password and paste it into the registration window.
When I click Apply, nothing happens.
@iPlunder, go to Path Finder->Registration, you should see something like "Registered to xxxx users" below field with serial.

I've seen that license window with all the previous versions, but all I get with this one is the registration window.

That's why I asked if this patch was supposed to give confirmation.

I do have v6.1.2 installed and it's not telling me I have xx days left for the demo, so it appears to be registered but isn't showing the license window.
